basic.description: A survey of the major authors and works of Latin American literature from 1492 to the end of the 19th century. Readings will include texts from all genres and will illustrate the main cultural and historical trends and movements.
basic.subject: SPAN
basic.title: Panorama literario latinoaméricano I

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     SPAN201 or SPAN205.
Exclusions    No more than 6.0 units from SPAN251; SPAN351; SPAN352.
